name: The Centre Cannot Hold album
description:
The debut album released in May 2013 on Misanthropic Records on CD. 

Tracks:
1. The Prisoner
2. Castle
3. Bullet
4. The Love of God
5. In Love With The Gun
6. Hollow
7. The Great and Secret Show
8. Die Like This

name: In Love With The Gun EP
description:
The EP/cd single for In Love With The Gun taken from the debut album The Centre Cannot Hold. It contains the title track along with 2 remixes and a final track inspired by the title track. It was released on November 2012 on Misanthropic Records.

Tracks:
1. In Love With The Gun
2. In Love With The Gun (High Calibre Mix)
3. Gun Control
4. Blood Has Been Spilt This Night

name: The Centre Cannot Hold Live DVD
description:
This is a film of the entire set of The Centre Cannot Hold album launch event at The Hunter Club in Bury St Edmunds, UK. 
It was recorded with 3 HD cameras and the audio was taken straight from the mixing desk.

Note: this is a REGION 2 disc so make sure that your player can play this before purchase.

Take a look at a couple of the songs here:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bEIDOysm9HE
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ifIBcgUOjms

Tracks:
1. A Look Within (intro)*
2. The Prisoner
3. Castle
4. Bullet
5. The Love of God
6. In Love With The Gun
7. Hollow
8. The Great and Secret Show
9. Die Like This

* not available on the album
